prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek blue scales and a ninja-like appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into water with stealthy movements and sharp attacks.
Design a dark and mysterious Pokemon with a unique water element and agile traits.
Generate a Pokemon that uses its agility to outmaneuver opponents in battles.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that embodies the essence of a ninja with aquatic features.
Give me a unique Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and excels in stealth.
Make a Pokemon with an emphasis on speed and agility, perfect for surprise attacks.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Speed and agility focused, using stealthy moves
